attributes.action: Reimburse university accommodation & tuition fees for courses changed to online
attributes.additional_details: We would like this to happen as it effects how much we will have to pay when we come out of university and we believe there is no need to add more money to that for no reason. This being because we 1) No longer need university accommodation and 2) Our academic teaching has been effected.
attributes.background: We would like to be reimbursed for accommodation fees and tuition fees for those universities that have moved to online as it effects how we study not being in a classroom and there is no need to be at university as everything has moved to online so we no longer need university accommodation.
